div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 163 Boeotia, opposite Chalcis, 1935 (232) Burial: c. 250 B.C. (Newell) Contents: 49 AR Alexander III: 14 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 4, Pella 2, Byblus 1, Babylon 5, unc. 2) Lysimachus: 22 lifetime tetradr. (Lamp- sacus 6, Pergamum 2, Smyrna 1, Ephesus 2, Magnesia 4, Sardes 1, Amphipolis 4, Aenus 1, unc. 1) 11 post. tetradr. (Lysima- cheia 5, Cyzicus ? 1, Byzantium? 1, unc. 4) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 2 tetradr. (Amphi- polis, Ephesus) Disposition: Athens 48 List of varieties on file in ANS
